WorkItem.Description:
Set to level 83 target.
 
Choker of Forceful Redemption - 48 ap, 21 expertise, 20 hit rating. Ranked as 9.22 dps points and 12.23 points overall.
 
Shattrath Choker of Power - 46 ap, no other stats. Ranked as 13.03 dps points.
 
Not sure how the heck a neck with less AP got ranked higher than one with 2 more points of AP, regardless of any other stats. I'd definitely say there's a bug or something reveresed in some calcs with hit and/or expertise.
 
Also: Not showing avoided attacks or crit chance in the complex stats box. Everything in that window is blank.
 
One thing to check: Is the 2pc T4 set bonus included in calcs? It's a kinda nutty set bonus and may no longer be worthwhile in LK... but I'd love to be able to know that for sure (especially since some of the gear has multiple gem slots, and you can boost the value of the gear through LK gems).
 
Attached is my char's .xml file that I was working with.

Comments.Message: Rawr.Cat's calculations for hit and exp are currently bugged; we're working on fixing them.
I believe that the 2pc T4 set bonus proc rate is getting diminishing returns based off of level.  By level 80, it will not proc anymore.
Astrylian, any word yet on the bug with the Cat model ignoring +hit and +expertise?
Also, this Issue Tracker show impact as low, the cat model is basically useless in this state, as I'm sure you realize.

We don't use the 'impact' field, that's just whatever the guy who reported it set it to.

It should be fixed in tomorrow's release.

Just wanted to pop in and say that this problem extends beyond just the RawrCat model, I know its a problem in the Retribution model also I noticed it yesterday. I think its using old conversions because its showing me as hit and expertise capped when Im a few % away in both categories.

Is there an update for this?  As of v2.1.9 build 31863, the optimizer seems to be largely ignoring hit rating for RawrCat.  I've seen it optimize my dps gear down to 198 hit rating (optimized for dps rating or survival rating).  That's close to 100 under cap, and I have plenty of gear to reach much higher +hit.  Also, can we add an option to optimize +hit as a condition?

The only bug with this was fixed months ago.

Rawr.Cat *is* optimizing your gear correctly. Hit is *not* the most valuable stat, and should not be necessarily capped.
